biotools.summary: PretiMeth is a precise computational prediction method of the CpG site-specific methylation level in multiple tissues or cells, it provides continuous methylation prediction values rather than methylation status and provides an independent accuracy for each CpG locus to allow users to screen high quality models(or CpGs).

bioschemas.name: PretiMeth
bioschemas.summary: PretiMeth is a precise computational prediction method of the CpG site-specific methylation level in multiple tissues or cells, it provides continuous methylation prediction values rather than methylation status and provides an independent accuracy for each CpG locus to allow users to screen high quality models(or CpGs).
